name: Flappy City: The Flying Weird
description:
✨THE ULTIMATE FLAPPY CITY EXPERIENCE

Challenge your reflexes with a classic style game. Try to earn points while navigate ‘Weird’ between the city themed obstacles by tapping the screen at the right time to jump! 

🏆 WEEKLY CHALLENGE IN FLAPPY CITY

Get new challenge and hero every week!

🎮 PLAYERS CAN HELP WITH DEVELOPMENT

I'll publish an update weekly, if you have any suggestion, please let me know at clayboyhomeoffice@gmail.com
